"prathibha madhya ekamuthuwa" nawaka pawulwala samajikayanta nayakwaya pilibadawa danuwath kirime puhunu wadamuluwak....mathakadi yuga diwiyatapath kambaurupitiya kottashaye nawaka pawulwala samajika samajikawan 30 denek sadaha nayakathwa puhunu wadasatahanak 2011 sapthambar masa 27 wana dina kambaurupitiya saukhya waidya niladhari karyalayedi pawathwiya.kambaurupitiya saukhya waidya niladhari karyalaye sambandhikaranayen pawathi mema puhunu wadamuluwa sanwidhanaya karana ladde prathibha madhya ekamuthuwa magini.nayakathwaya haduna ganima, pawula thula gatum nirakaranaya, satuthu pawule mathdrawya ...	28

shakthimath aarthikayak, pohosath ratak bihikara janathawata wada honda jiwana thaththwayak athi kirimata awashya rajya prathipaththi janatha apeksha anuwa hadagaswimata awashya yojana mema ayawaya yojana awasthawedi mudal ha janamadhya amathya mangala samarawira mahatha wisin anawarana kirimata niyamitha ya.

» mama janathawa wenuwen satan wadinna sudanam – sajith premadasa eksath jathika paksha niyojya nayaka sajith premadasa eeye (15) blumandal dumriya patumagehi janathawa hamuwemin pawasa sitiye ‘‘ada manussakama sampurnayenma bahara karala wisheshayen janathawage duka kiyana mathrukawa sampurnayenma deshapalana nyaya pathrayen iwath karala hithamathama balahathkariwa blumandal dumriya patumagehi jiwath wana obalawa me sthanayen iwath karanna me aanduwa ganna wu kriyamargayata api aniwaryenma janathawa samanga indagena janathawa wenuwen satan wadinna sudanam’’ bawayi.
purana grisiye me sanakeliya meyakarayen thibune natha.

jawipe nayaka rohana wijewira, lekam upathissa gamanayaka, deshapalana mandala sabhikayinwana sannaddha nayaka saman piyasiri pranandu saha layanalta kalak upades dun kolambaa disthrik hitapu nayaka lalith wijerathna nohoth jayantha, sannaddha anshaye katayuuthuwaladi layanalta puhunuwa saha mangapenwima labadun madhyama karaka sabhika eeshwarage aariyasena, guwan hamuda hitapu karmika niladhari kaduwela pittugala kahanthota upan kehelwaththa gamaralalage siripala, kolambaa saha gampaha kalak sannaddha lekamwa siti yustas dilip chandra pranandu nohoth pathi, gampaha pahalagama sheltan rajapaksha nohoth saman wirasinha, layanalda ekwu wadduwa hamuda kandawurin aayudha paharaganime salasume nayaka shantha bandara, praharayata sakapita athadanguwata pathwu em.
